articles.description: Rasavathi fails to make a mark, even with many fascinating characters. The makers have indeed created many intriguing characters but then failed to place them in a setting that is as compelling as them.
articles.content: Rasavathi Movie Synopsis: Sadha Siva Pandian, a Siddha doctor with a traumatic past, meets and falls for Soorya. At present, he is leading a peaceful life but things take a turn when a police officer… [+2006 chars]
